name: qrty
description: QR code decoder using screen capture or file upload

scripts.build:scripts: tsc scripts/dev-server.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc scripts/generate-icons.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc scripts/generate-og-image.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc scripts/generate-qr-code.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:renderer: tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && cp -R build/renderer/* src/ && rm -rf build/renderer
scripts.build:prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html src/styles.css src/sitemap.xml src/.nojekyll dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/renderer.js src/utils/image-processing.js dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.generate:all: pnpm run generate:icons && pnpm run generate:og-image && pnpm run generate:qr-code
scripts.build: pnpm run build:scripts && pnpm run build:renderer && pnpm run build:prepare && pnpm run generate:all
